    # ğŸ”¨ ä½¿ç”¨

    // åŠ è½½å¾®åº”ç”¨
import { loadMicroApp, registerMicroApps } from 'qiankun'
import store from '@/store'

export default function registerApp () {
  registerMicroApps(
    [
      {
        name: 'dh',
        entry: ' http://192.168.10.191:8001/',
        container: document.querySelector('#appContainer'),
        activeRule: '/dh',
        props: { store }
      }
    ],
    {
      beforeLoad: [
        app => {
          console.log('before load', app)
        }
      ], // æŒ‚è½½å‰å›è°ƒ
      beforeMount: [
        app => {
          console.log('before mount', app)
        }
      ], // æŒ‚è½½åå›è°ƒ
      afterUnmount: [
        app => {
          console.log('after unload', app)
        }
      ] // å¸è½½åå›è°ƒ
    }
  )
}

    export default {

  },
